attributes.action: hold a vote in parliament to decide if troops on active service in a war-zone should become exempt from paying income tax. Should the vote go in favour, it should be brought into law.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The aim of this petition is to attempt to bring about an end to income tax our troops have to pay whilst they are on active service & based in a war-zone.

There should be an open debate about this issue in parliament, followed by a vote by MP's. 

Should the vote go in favour, it should be passed into law that troops risking their lives' for this country will be exempt from paying any income tax.

N.I. contributions are not involved in this petition & would still be payable regardless of any outcome of this petition.
